description: Eating on the run just became healthier by adding Danone Vanilla YoPro Yoghurt to an almond biscuit base for a protein hit.
name: Healthier Protein Yoghurt Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Grease and line two oven trays with baking paper.
Place banana in a large bowl. Mash with a fork until almost smooth. Add the yoghurt, spread, almond meal, flour and cinnamon. Mix well.

Add 1 heaped tbs of yoghurt mixture at a time onto prepared trays and flatten slightly into a disc shape. Sprinkle with almonds. Bake for 15 minutes or until browned. Allow to cool on trays. Store in an airtight container for up to 3 days.
